subject: Compliment Of The Season From United Nations Economic
body:
Compliment Of The Season From United Nations Economic
Commission for Africa
Attention Please: Dear Beneficiary

Please allow me to introduce myself I am Jessica Lapenn the US Ambassador to
the African Union and the US Permanent Representative to the United Nations
Economic Commission for Africa, Please i wish to inform you about an awarded
funds in your name that was brought to the Treasury office under an
appointed committees by the newly inaugurated government of usa.

A petition from the Bank of Africa (BOA) board of executives was received to
divert your fund to the Government Treasury, Reasons, failure to comply in
reclaiming your fund due to some past experience and expenses of an attempt
you made to claim these funds before but failed, the total sum of ($10.5
MUSD) approved fund in your Name is petitioned to be confiscate as an
overdue fund payment since you refuse to claim it.

But this office has been urged to wait until we hear from you to know the 
reason why you are incurious About the ($10.5MUSD) which can change your 
whole life just because of a legal clearance permit fee for the sum amount
of money from there Bank to make sure paying the fund to you is in every 
proceeding legitimacy in legal constituted laws of such funds payment.

We want your urgent response as soon as you receive this email to know the
reason why you have abandoned the approved fund in your name. Are you
intentionally NOT interested in claiming the funds? Does it mean you don't
want the funds? Please make us understand before the treasury department 
will sign the petition letter that was brought together with some of your 
details provided by the (BOA) Central to confiscate the fund and change your
name off the beneficiary not to allow third party claims.
Please kindly respond with confirmation of your detail below;

Here are some details you need to provide to us for validations

Your Full Name: __________________________
Your Private Phone Number: _____________
Home Address: __________________________
Sex______________________________________
Age: ___________________________________

We will be waiting to hear from you immediately you read our email
email:jessicalapenn@gmail.com(mailto:jessicalapenn@gmail.com)

My Best Regards
Signed by
Dr Carlos Lopes
formal secretary of the United Nations
Economic Commission for Africa

subject: Re: Compliment Of The Season From United Nations Economic
body:
Hello Dr. Carlos Lopes,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I hope you are doing well. I must admit, this email has caught my attention. Can you please provide me with more details about the awarded funds in my name? I would like to understand the situation better before making any decisions.

Could you clarify what legal clearance permit fee you mentioned? How much is it, and why is it necessary? Also, what steps do I need to take to claim the funds successfully?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jimmy
